commit.message:
fold-const.c (merge_ranges): If range_successor or range_predecessor fail, just return 0.

./:	* fold-const.c (merge_ranges): If range_successor or
	range_predecessor fail, just return 0.
testsuite/:
	* g++.dg/conversion/enum1.C: New test.

From-SVN: r125486

+
+	* fold-const.c (merge_ranges): If range_successor or
+	range_predecessor fail, just return 0.
+
